Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code into a separate method
Improvements.Description: The process of creating a URI, HttpHost and HttpRoute is repeated three times in the method. This code can be extracted into a separate method to increase the reusability and readability of the code.

Improvements.Improvement: Use final for objects that won't be re-assigned
Improvements.Description: The objects `clientFactory`, `maxConnectionsPerHost`, `client` and `poolingHttpClientConnectionManager` are not re-assigned in the method. They can be declared as final to clearly communicate that they won't be re-assigned.
